name: Eron Strong-Scent
biography: Born in a country, Eron was told that he would never send things into space. He proved them wrong when he did.

name: Mat Clutter
biography: Hailing from Wisconsin, he loves cheese, cheesecurds, and responding to people who say 'Wisconsin, huh? You have cheese there, right?'

name: Connor MacLeod
biography: Born in 1518 in Scotland to Clan MacLeod, there can be only one.
